title: Crispy Chicken Wings with Ranchitas Nacho Excitante
ingredients: 4 bags of Ranchitas Nacho Excitante (or flavor of your choice)
instructions: Step 1. Place the chicken wings in a bowl, add the spices and mix well. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Step 2. After 1 hour, coat the wings with half of the flour.
Step 3. Crush the Ranchitas until they resemble panko or breadcrumbs and place them in a bowl.
Step 4. Beat the eggs with the remaining flour and mix in the crushed Ranchitas until you get a dense mixture.

Step 6. Dip the wings in the mixture and fry them for about 15–20 minutes or until they reach an internal temperature of 74°C (165°F). Drain on paper towels and serve with ranch dressing or your favorite sauce.
description: Delicious crispy chicken wings breaded with Ranchitas Nacho Excitante. Perfect for sharing at gatherings or enjoying as a snack.
